ClientListMessage.summary: Class that represent an immutable message that allow communicate to all replicas, all the ActorRefs and Public Keys from the clients

ClientListMessageC.summary: Constructor that allow you create an instance of this class and send all clients and their public key to all replicas.
ClientListMessageC.param: Dictionary that contains IActorRef of alls client and ther public key.

Clients.summary: Dictionary that contains IActorRef of alls client and ther public key.
